app.title: Fast Ship - Global Shipping Platform
app.name: Fast Ship
hero.title: üåç From Your Neighborhood to the World
hero.subtitle: Fast Shipping - Voluntary Commission - Trusted Ratings
hero.description: The first global platform connecting shipment senders with carriers of all transport types - from motorcycle to ship - from taxi to plane - with no mandatory commission!
features.title: Why Choose Fast Ship?
features.global.title: Global Reach
features.global.description: From your neighborhood to any country in the world - same platform, same trust
features.commission.title: Voluntary Commission
features.commission.description: 1% from sender + 2% from carrier - completely optional to support the platform
features.ratings.title: Mutual Ratings
features.ratings.description: Transparent rating system helps you choose the best and build trust
features.ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
features.ai.description: Smart assistant suggests the best carriers and automatically estimates costs
features.chat.title: Secure Communication
features.chat.description: Internal chat or WhatsApp - maintains privacy and records
features.security.title: Full Security
features.security.description: Connection platform only - no responsibility on us, but we provide verification tools
howItWorks.title: How the Platform Works?
howItWorks.step1.title: Create Your Shipment
howItWorks.step1.description: Specify shipment type, weight, route, and expected budget
howItWorks.step2.title: Choose the Right Carrier
howItWorks.step2.description: Browse offers, compare prices and ratings, choose the most suitable
howItWorks.step3.title: Negotiate the Price
howItWorks.step3.description: Discuss details and price - full flexibility between both parties
howItWorks.step4.title: Track Your Shipment
howItWorks.step4.description: Follow shipment status moment by moment until delivery
shipmentForm.title: Send Your Shipment Now
shipmentForm.donation: I want to make voluntary contribution (1%) to support the platform
carrier.title: Register as Carrier
footer.description: Global platform connecting shipment senders with carriers of all types
